trans-unit.source: The number of comments per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination.
trans-unit.target: Defini il dumber d'elements per pagina. 0 munta deactivar la numeraziun da paginas.

trans-unit.source: Approve comments before they are published on the website.
trans-unit.target: Approvar ils commentaris avant ch'els vegnan publitgads sin la website.

trans-unit.source: Allow visitors to format their comments with BBCode.
trans-unit.target: Lubir als visitaders da formatar ils commentaris cun BBCode.

trans-unit.source: Allow only authenticated users to create comments.
trans-unit.target: Lubir be ad utilisaders annunziads da crear commentaris.

trans-unit.source: Here you can disable the security question (not recommended).
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus deactivar la dumonda da segirezza (betg recumand√†).

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the comments template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus tscherner il template da commentaris.
